title: Communist party controls major mass org. in China

content.question: The Communist Youth League (CYL), All-China Federation of Trade Unions, and All-China Women's Federation are significant because they

choices.label: severely limit the power of the Chinese Communist Party
were the first ideological organizations eliminated under Deng Xiaoping's reforms
answer directly to the central government rather than to the Chinese Communist Party
are mass organizations that have served as channels of political education and partici­pation under Chinese Communist Party rule
were founded during the Cultural Revolution to protect their constituents from bureau­cratic excesses

content.answer: are mass organizations that have served as channels of political education and partici­pation under Chinese Communist Party rule
